PERiskProfileR

PERiskProfileR.Rmd

Installation 

if (!requireNamespace("devtools", quietly = TRUE))
    install.packages("devtools")

devtools::install_github("andjar/PERiskProfileR", ref = "main")

Data specification

A demo data set is provided with the package to demonstrate the expected input data. The demo data can be accessed with the get_demo_data() function.

Local risk calculation

Getting MoMs

Getting Risk Scores

Online risk calculation

Saving and reading HTML files

For documentation and retrieval, the PERiskProfileR package will download and save the result web pages from the online FMF calculator. If you have a folder with downloaded HTML files, you can extract the risk scores and MoMs directly from these offline files using the extract_risk_scores_from_files() function.
